K10bsu005_u:92: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati //
K10bsu005_u:104: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati //
K10bsu005_u:232: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
K10bsu005_u:233: śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
K10bsu005_u:234: ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
K10bsu005_u:235: jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
K10bsu005_u:236: kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
K10bsu005_u:237: manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
K10bsu005_u:322: yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmiṃstasmin sattvanikāye jātiḥ,
K10bsu005_u:332: nikāyasabhāgatāyāstasyā yat khālityaṃ pālityaṃ valīpracuratā jīrṇatā bhugnatā kub
K10bsu005_u:334: daṇḍāvaṣṭambhatā indriyāṇāṃ paripākaḥ paribhedaḥ saṃbhārāṇāṃ purāṇībhāvo jarjarībhāvaḥ
K10bsu005_u:338: yatteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmācchavikāyāccyutiḥ cyavanatā bhedo 'ntardhānaṃ maraṇaṃ kālakriyā āyuṣo hāniḥ uṣmaṇo hāniḥ jīvitendriyasya nirodhaḥ skandhānāṃ nikṣepaḥ /
K10bsu005_u:360: yadapītthaṃ paryeṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate tadapi duḥkham /
K10bsu005_u:364: tadyathā - yeyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī,
K10bsu005_u:367: yadasyā eva tṛṣṇāyāḥ paunarbhavikyā nandīrāgasahagatāyāstatratatrābhinandinyā aśeṣataḥ prahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyayībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo
K10bsu005_u:373: tadyathā - kaścitpuruṣo jvarābhibhūtaḥ kuśalasaṃpaddṛṣṭakarmāṇaṃ śrutaśāstraṃ vaidyamupasaṃkramya kathayedevam - jvare 'śāntibhūto 'smi /
K10bsu005_u:375: sa tasya bhiṣak prāṅ nidānaṃ pṛcchet - kiṃ tvayā bhuktaṃ pītaṃ ceti /
K10bsu005_u:376: āturastasya kathayet - mayā hi dadhi trapuṣaṃ bhakṣitam,
K10bsu005_u:379: evameva jātyādimahājvarasaṃtāpitāḥ sādhavo mahācittabhiṣajaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ nāthaṃ tathāgatamupasaṃkramya duḥkhajvarāpahaṃ dharmaṃ pṛccheyuḥ
K10bsu005_u:380: tebhyo bhagavān nidānaṃ samudayākhyāmākhyāya āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo mahauṣadhaṃ śāntikaraṃ nirvāṇamupadiśet /
K10bsu005_u:382: 'pyenaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayan nacirātsarvaduḥkhakṣayamavāpya nirvāṇapuraṃ gatvā pariśāntimavāpnotīti //
K10bsu005_u:437: bhavatu, ityanayā buddhyā yad niṣṭhūravacanaśrāvaṇaṃ kriyate,
K10bsu005_u:440: rājakathā caurakathā dyūtakathā madyakathā strīkathā ākhyāyikākathā /
K10bsu005_u:444: paradravyasvīkaraṇecchayā anyasya dravyāṇi tāniḥ mama syuritīyamucyate abhidhyā //
K10bsu005_u:454: bhikṣostāvat kuhanā lapanā naimittikatvaṃ naiṣpeṣikatvaṃ lābhena lābhapratikāṅkṣā samyagājīvaḥ /
K10bsu005_u:457: bhikṣurdānapatiṃ dṛṣṭvā paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā pathi śūnyāgāre niṣīdati dhyāyī - bhikṣurarhanniti lābhasatkāro me bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu005_u:460: katamā? iha bhikṣurlābhasatkāranimittameva tvaṃ me mātā,
K10bsu005_u:466: bhikṣustāvat piṇḍapātraṃ paribhuktvā sakṛdasakṛd yad brūte - yādṛśo 'yaṃ piṇḍapātaḥ,
K10bsu005_u:471: bhikṣustāvad yatra gṛhe piṇḍapātraṃ na labhate,
K10bsu005_u:479: bhikṣustāvadātmīyena dhanena śobhanānicīvarāṇi copakrīya upāsakebhyo darśayati - īdṛśāni vayaṃ vastrāṇi dānapatibhyo labhāmahe iti /
K10bsu005_u:485: iha khalu bhikṣavaḥ upāsakasya mithyājīvaḥ katamaḥ?
K10bsu005_u:499: iha khalu bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā utpanne rāge bāhyātmikayoḥ śarīrayoraśubhākāreṇa yathābhūtadarśī bhavati - santyasmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā rajomalatvaṅmāṃsam,
K10bsu005_u:501: maka āmāśayaḥ pakkāśayaḥ antrāṇi antraguṇā odarīyakaṃ yakṛt parīṣamaśru svedaḥ khelakaḥ siṃghāṇako vasā lasīkā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śleṣmā
K10bsu005_u:506: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ viviktaṃ kāmaiḥ viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamadhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati /
K10bsu005_u:507: sa vitarkavicāravyupaśamādadhyātmasaṃprasādāccetasa ekotibhāvādavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyadhyānamupasaṃpadyaṃ viharati
K10bsu005_u:509: sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayate - yattadāryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī - tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati /
K10bsu005_u:510: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇādduḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthadhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati /
K10bsu005_u:516: yaduta cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyaṃ manendriyaṃ
K10bsu005_u:517: puruṣendriyaṃ strīndriyaṃ duḥkhendriyaṃ sukhendriyaṃ saumanasyendriyaṃ daurmanasyendriyaṃ
K10bsu005_u:518: upekṣendriyaṃ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ jñānendriyaṃ jīvitendriyam,
K10bsu005_u:524: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣurviviktaṃ kāmaiḥ viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati /
K10bsu005_u:525: sa vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamādadhyātmasaṃprasādāccetasa ekotibhāvādavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati
K10bsu005_u:528: sukhaṃ kāyena pratisaṃvedayate - yattadāryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī - tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati /
K10bsu005_u:529: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇādduḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvameva saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamāda duḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati //
K10bsu005_u:532: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣurmaitrīsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asaṃpannena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena ekādrisamaṃ vimucya sphuritvā upasaṃpadya viharati,
K10bsu005_u:536: iti ūrdhvamadhastiryak sarvaśaḥ sarvāvantamimaṃ lokaṃ maitrīsahagatena cittena avaireṇa
K10bsu005_u:537: asaṃpannena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena advayena apramāṇena subhāvitena ekāṃ
K10bsu005_u:541: upekṣāsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asaṃpannena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena advayena apramāṇena subhāvitena ekāṃ diśamadhimucya sphuritvā upasaṃpadya viharati /
K10bsu005_u:548: tatra katamā sā duḥkhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā?
K10bsu005_u:555: tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇi indriyāṇi dhandhāni bhavanti mṛdūni saśīghravāhīni /
K10bsu005_u:557: yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam /
K10bsu005_u:558: sa eṣāṃ pañcānāṃ lokottarāṇamindriyāṇāṃ mṛdutvādaśīghravāhitvācca dhandhamevānantaryasamādhiṃ spṛśati yaduta āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya /
K10bsu005_u:568: tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇi indriyāṇi adhimātrāṇi bhavanti tīkṣṇāni śīghravāhīni /
K10bsu005_u:570: yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam /
K10bsu005_u:571: sa eṣāṃ pañcānāṃ lokottarāṇāmindriyāṇāmadhimātratvācchīghravāhitvācca kṣipramevānantaryaṃ samādhiṃ spṛśati yaduta āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya /
K10bsu005_u:580: tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇīndriyāṇi dhandhāni bhavanti mṛdūni na tīkṣṇāni na śīghravāhīni /
K10bsu005_u:582: yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryandriyaṃ smḥtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyaṃ /
K10bsu005_u:583: sa eṣāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ dhandhātvānmḥdutvādaśīghravāhitvācca dhandhamevānantaryaṃ samādhiṃ spḥśati yadutāsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya /
K10bsu005_u:590: alpamohatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ mohajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ prativedayati / tasyemāni
K10bsu005_u:593: yaduta śraddendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam /
K10bsu005_u:594: sa eṣāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāmadhimātratvāt tīkṣṇatvācchīghravāhitvācca kṣipramevānantaryaṃ samādhiṃ spṛśati yaduta āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya /
K10bsu005_u:598: ...........asti bhikṣavaḥ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanapratilābhāya saṃvartate /
K10bsu005_u:599: asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate /
K10bsu005_u:600: tatra katamā samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya saṃvartate?
K10bsu005_u:601: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣu rimameva kāyamūrdhvaṃ pādatalādadhaḥ keśamastakādiparyantaṃ yathāsthitaṃ
K10bsu005_u:602: tathāpraṇihitaṃ pūrṇaṃ nānāprakārasyāśuceryathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā pratyavekṣate
K10bsu005_u:603: - yaduta ayaṃ kāyaḥ anupūrveṇa samudāgato 'pūrvavināśī paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ suṣira unnāmonnāmanānmānavavraṇasumukharomakūpasrāvī
K10bsu005_u:649: punaraparaṃ bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā idaṃ śarīramādyuttarakāraṇataḥ parīkṣitavyam /
K10bsu005_u:655: pittāśayaṃ prāpya pacyamāna uṣṇībhūtvā vāyvāśayaṃ gacchati /
K10bsu005_u:656: paktvā vāyvāśayaṃ prāpto vāyunā vibhajyate pṛthak malaḥ,
K10bsu005_u:664: śukram / tadevamādyuttarakāraṇādaśuci śarīramiti paśyatā bhikṣuṇā idaṃ śarīraṃ navabhirasthiśataiḥ saṣaṣṭhaiḥ samucchritaṃ kudārugṛhavat tribhiḥ
K10bsu005_u:672: saptottareṇa marmaśatena bhinnabhājanamiva jarjareṇa koṭīśatasahasrairaśītibhiśca tṛṇavacchannam,
K10bsu005_u:691: kevalaṃ yācitakabhāṇḍamiva kṣaṇaprayojanārthaṃ śakaṭamiva bhārodvahanāya dharmabuddhinā boddha(voḍha)vyam //
K10bsu005_u:696: priyaprakāraṃ vahatenāyat drakṣanvivaktuṃ vahate sadā ca /
K10bsu005_u:697: kāyaḥ sucokṣaḥ kṛmivacca jantoḥ kuto 'tra rāgo bahumānatā vā // (AvSū, Vaidya 320)
K10bsu005_u:699: tadyathā bhikṣava ubhayato dvāravinirmuktaḥ koṣṭhāgāraḥ pūrṇo nānāprakārajātasya dhānyatilasarṣapamudgayavamāṣāṇām /
K10bsu005_u:700: taccakṣuṣmān puruṣo vyavalokayan jānīyāt - imāni śūkadhānyāni,
K10bsu005_u:702: evameva bhikṣavo bhikṣurimameva kāyaṃ yathāsthitaṃ yathāpraṇihitaṃ yāvat pratyavekṣate /
K10bsu005_u:703: iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya saṃvartate /
K10bsu005_u:704: tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamā samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya saṃvartate?
K10bsu005_u:705: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuraraṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā imameva kāyamadhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ vivekāt na prītisukhenābhiṣyandayati,
K10bsu005_u:709: tasya nāsti sarvataḥ kāyādasphuṭaṃ bhavatyaspharaṇīyaṃ yaduta adhyātmajaṃ vivekajena prītisukhena /
K10bsu005_u:710: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavaḥ utpalāni vā padmāni vā kumudāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake jātāni
K10bsu005_u:712: sarvāṇi tāni śītalena vāriṇābhiṣyanditāni pariṣyanditāni paripūritāni pariprīṇitāni parisphuritāni /
K10bsu005_u:713: evameva bhikṣuraraṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā imameva kāyamadhyātmaṃ
K10bsu005_u:714: pratyātmaṃ vivekajena prītisukhenābhiṣyandayati pariṣyandayati paripūrayati parisphurayati pariprīṇayati,
K10bsu005_u:715: tasya nāsti sarvataḥ kāyamasphuṭaṃ bhavatyaspharaṇīyaṃ yaduta adhyātmakaṃ vivekajena prītisukhena /
K10bsu005_u:716: iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharma(sukha)
K10bsu005_u:718: tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamā samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanena pratilābhāya saṃvartate?
K10bsu005_u:719: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā ālokasaṃjñā sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca parigṛhītā bhavati sumanasi
K10bsu005_u:720: kṛtā sudṛṣṭā supratibaddhā ca divasasaṃjñādhiṣṭhitaṃ samaprabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati
K10bsu005_u:726: yathaivordhva tathā adhaḥ - iti vivṛtena cetasā parya(va)
K10bsu005_u:728: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavo grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse vyabhre dine vigatabalāhake nabhasi madhyāhnakālasamaye ālokapariśuddho bhavati paryavadātaprabhāsvaraḥ, na tasmā(?)
K10bsu005_u:730: evameva bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā ālokasaṃjñā sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca sugṛhīto bhavati aśṛṃṣṭā supratibandhonavamasaṃjñā - vesthitā(?)
K10bsu005_u:731: samaprabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati yathā divā tathā rātrau yathā rātrau tathā divā,
K10bsu005_u:734: yathaivordhvaṃ tathaivādho yathaivādhastathaivordhvamiti vivṛtena cetasā aparyavanaddhena divasasaṃjñādhiṣṭhitena samaprabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati
K10bsu005_u:735: iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanapratibhānalābhāya saṃvartate //
K10bsu005_u:737: dhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate?
K10bsu005_u:739: vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā sukhasya (duḥkhasya)
K10bsu005_u:742: iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate //
K10bsu005_u:745: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuradhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke abhidhyādaurmanasye /
K10bsu005_u:747: adhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan anusmṛtimān vinīya loke abhidhyādaurmanasye /
K10bsu005_u:748: adhyātmavadenāsu bahirdhāvedanāsu adhyātmabahirdhā vedanāsu vedanānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke abhidhyādaurmanasye
K10bsu005_u:749: adhyātmacitte bahirdhācitte adhyātmabahirdhā cittānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke abhidhyādaurmanasye /
K10bsu005_u:750: adhyātmadharmeṣu bahirdhādharmeṣu adhyātmabahirdhādharmeṣu dharmānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke abhidhyādaurmanasye
K10bsu005_u:753: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuranutpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādāya chandaṃ janayati,
K10bsu005_u:768: utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye bhāvanāyai asaṃmoṣāya aparihāṇāya bhūyobhāvāya vṛddhivipulatāyai pāripūryai chandaṃ janayati,
K10bsu005_u:774: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ chandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam
K10bsu005_u:776: cittasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇataṃ mā me cittamatilīnaṃ bhaviṣyati nābhigṛhītam // 3 //
K10bsu005_u:777: mīmāṃsāsamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇataṃ mā me mīmāṃsā nātilīnā bhaviṣyati nābhigṛhītam // 4 //
K10bsu005_u:780: yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam /
K10bsu005_u:786: yadyadeva karma kariṣyāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā,
K10bsu005_u:807: yaduta śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ smṛtibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ prajñābalam /
K10bsu005_u:812: bodhyaṅgaṃ dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ gāmbhīryasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ prītisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ prasrabdhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ samādhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgam
K10bsu005_u:813: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam //
K10bsu005_u:814: evaṃ dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam //
K10bsu005_u:815: vīryasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam //
K10bsu005_u:816: prītisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam /
K10bsu005_u:817: prasrabdhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśrita nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam //
K10bsu005_u:818: samādhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam //
K10bsu005_u:823: ? tadyathā - samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṃkalpaḥ samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhiḥ /
K10bsu005_u:837: yayā rāge nātmānaṃ na parāṃśca tāpayati,
K10bsu005_u:856: yadārthavaśena guṇasaṃlekhādutsarjanatā na kuhanatā na lapanatā na naiṣpeṣikatā sṛvatāravācāśīlatā(?)
K10bsu005_u:868: yā sūpasthitā aprakampyā ṛjukā akuṭilā saṃsāradveṣādīnavadarśikā nirvāṇapathapraṇetrī smṛtiḥ spharaṇaṃ āryamārgāsaṃmoṣaḥ /
K10bsu005_u:872: yasmin samādhau sthitaḥ sarvasattvapramokṣāya samyak sthitatvaṃ niyāmamavakrāmati,
K10bsu005_u:878: dīrghaṃ vā praśvasan dīrghaṃ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:880: hrasvaṃ vā praśvasan hrasvaṃ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:881: kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:882: kāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan kāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:883: kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:884: kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasan yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:885: sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:886: kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārāpratisaṃvedī vā praśvasan yathābhūtaṃ
K10bsu005_u:887: prajānāti / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:888: sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:891: prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārā āśvasan prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārā āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:892: prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārāḥ praśvasan prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārāḥ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:893: prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasan prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:896: sukhapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sukhapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ jānāti /
K10bsu005_u:898: prajānāti / cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:903: cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:906: prasrabhyanti me cittasaṃskārāḥ praśvasan praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:907: abhimodati me cittamāśvasan abhimodati me cittamāśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:908: abhimodati me cittaṃ praśvasan abhimodati me cittaṃ praśvasāmīti yathā(bhūtaṃ prajānāti) /
K10bsu005_u:909: vimucyati me cittamāśvasan vimucyati me cittamāśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:911: cyati me cittaṃ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:913: cittamāśvasan samāhitaṃ me cittamāśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:914: samāhitaṃ me cittaṃ praśvasan samāhitaṃ me cittaṃ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:915: evamanityānudarśī virāgānudarśī nirodhānudarśī pratiniḥsargānudarśī āśvasan pratiniḥsargānudarśī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:916: .........pratiniḥsargānudarśī vā praśvasan pratiniḥsargānudarśī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:919: iha bhikṣavaḥ śrāvako 'vetya buddhe prasādena samanvāgato bhavati - ityapi sa bhagavāṃstathāgato
K10bsu005_u:922: dharme 'vetya prasādena samanvāgato bhavati - svākhyāto bhagavatā dharmaḥ sāṃdṛṣṭiko
K10bsu005_u:923: nirjvaraḥ ākālika aupanāyikaḥ ihapaśyakaḥ pratyātmavedanīyo vijñairyaduta nadanimadanapadheyāsāṃ(?)
K10bsu005_u:924: prativinaya ālayasamuddhāto dharmopacchedaḥ śūnyatānupalambhaḥ tṛṣṇākṣayo nirodho nirvāṇam /
K10bsu005_u:925: saṃghe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgato bhavati - supratipanno bhagavataḥ āryaśrāvakasaṃgho nyāyapratipannaḥ sapratipannaḥ sāmīcipratipanno dharmānudharmapratipanno 'nudharmacārī /
K10bsu005_u:936: eṣa bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ śraddhāsaṃpannaḥ śrutasaṃpannaḥ samādhisaṃpannaḥ prajñāsaṃpannaḥ
K10bsu005_u:938: sāmīcikaraṇīyaḥ anuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ darśanīyo lokasya yaduta āryakāntaiḥ śīlaiḥ
K10bsu005_u:939: samanvāgato yāni śīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchidrāṇi adhṛtīni aśabalāni akalmaṣāṇi bhujiṣyāṇi
K10bsu005_u:940: aparāmṛṣṭāni susamastāni vijñapraśastāni jayasaṃpannāni agarhitāni vijñairiti /
K10bsu005_u:943: tathāgataḥ sthānaṃ ca sthānato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
K10bsu005_u:955: dve tisraścatasro yāvadanekānyapi jātikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyanusmaratīti vistaraḥ / sa
K10bsu005_u:956: divyena cakṣuṣā atikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyavamānānupapadyamānānapi /
K10bsu005_u:962: ime tvayā dharmā nābhisaṃbuddhā ityatra kaścidvādaṃ samāropayet sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāyām
K10bsu005_u:964: nimittaṃ samanupaśyaṃstathāgato bhagavān kṣemaprāpto abhayaprāpta ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ prajānāti /
K10bsu005_u:966: brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayati apravartitaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā kenacidvā punarloke sahadharmeṇeti /
K10bsu005_u:967: ye punastathāgatairnāntarāyikā dharmā ākhyātāḥ tānapratisevamānasya nānamantarāyet(?)
K10bsu005_u:969: yā vā anena pratipadākhyātā āryā nairyāṇikā hīnāṃ pratiraṣāvamāṇo(?)
K10bsu005_u:972: kṣīṇāsravasya satamātmānaṃ pratijānataḥ ime āsravā aparikṣīṇā ityatra
K10bsu005_u:973: kaścidvādamāropayet sadevaloke samārake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāyāṃ nimittamevaṃ na samanupaśyati /
K10bsu005_u:974: nimitta(ma)samanupaśyan tathāgataḥ sthāmaprāpto viharati abhayaprāpta āha(rṣa?)
K10bsu005_u:977: brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayati apravartitaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā kenacidvā punarloke sahadharmeṇeti /
K10bsu005_u:1040: supratiṣṭhitau pādautathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ dṛḍhasamādānatayā nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1041: adhastātpādatalayoścakrāṅkitapā datalatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve parasattvājihmakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1042: āyatapādapārṣṇisaṃgatapādatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve mātāpitarau satkṛtya caraṇe śuśrūṣatayābhinirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1043: dīrghāṅgulikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve dharmārakṣāvaraṇaguptikaraṇayā nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1044: jālahastapādatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve parivārābhedanatayā nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1045: mṛdutaruṇahastapādatātathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve vividhaprāvaraṇānnapradānatayā nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1048: ........viśuddhanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve daśakuśalakarmapathātaptasamādānatayā nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1049: kambugrīvatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve glāneṣu vividhabhaiṣajyānnapradānatayā nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1050: siṃhahanutā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve kuśalamūlaprayogatayā nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1051: samacatvāriṃśaddantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve sattvasamāśvāsanaprayogatayā nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1052: aviraladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1053: samadantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve manāpamaṇipradānatayā nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1054: suśukladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve svārakṣitakāyavāṅmanaskarmatayā nirvṛttam
K10bsu005_u:1056: jihvatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ satyabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1060: brahmakalaviṅkarutasvaratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve snigdhavacanasattvānāṃvanatā(?)
K10bsu005_u:1062: abhinīlanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve maitravatsattvasaṃrakṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1063: gopakṣmanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve a(pra?)
K10bsu005_u:1065: sūkṣmacchavitā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve dharmasaṃgīticittasaṃrakṣaṇakarmaṇyatayā nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1068: ekaikaromakūpatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve saṃgaṇikāparivarjanatayā nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1069: pradakṣiṇāvartaromatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣaṣya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve ācāryopādhyāyakalyāṇamitrānuśāsanipradakṣiṇagrāhitayā nirvṛttam
K10bsu005_u:1070: indranīlakeśatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve sarvaprāṇānukampanatayā nihataloṣṭadaṇḍaśastratayā nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1071: suśuklabhramukhāntarorṇalalāṭatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve varṇārhānāṃ varṇabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1072: uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve gurugauravapraṇāmatayā nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1073: nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalasamantaprāsādikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve ātmanaḥ parasattvānāṃ ca
K10bsu005_u:1076: tathāgatabimbakaraṇatayā bhinnastūpapratisaṃskāratayā pareṣāṃ ca bhītānāmāśvāsanasaṃghānatayā ca nirvṛttam /
K10bsu005_u:1077: apramāṇaiḥ kuśalamūlaiśca teṣu dharmeṣu vaśavartitvāt tathāgatasya dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni kāye nirvṛttāni //
K10bsu005_u:1084: samakramāśca śucigātrāśca mṛdugātrāśca viśuddhagātrāśca utsadagātrāśca susaṃhatagātrāśca
K10bsu005_u:1091: tapadmanayanāśca nīlotpaladalanayanāśca vyāyatapīnacakṣuṣaśca āyatabhruvaśca samaromabhruvaśca snigdhabhruvaśca pīnāyatakarṇāśca samakarṇāśca anupahatakarṇāśca (AvSū, Vaidya 328)
K10bsu005_u:1096: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā - dharmaṃ vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ savyañjanam,
K10bsu005_u:1097: kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ prakāśayāmi - yaduta arthaviniścayaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyamiti yato yaduktamidaṃ tat pratyuktam
K10bsu005_u:1101: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmāsravebhyaścitāni vimuktāni //
K10bsu005_u:1103: āttamanasaste ca bhikṣavaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
